Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails for responses from @LEGAL-1 and @COMP-1. Address any urgent matters. Review outstanding questions regarding accounting policies and procedures.
Continue refining the accounting policies and procedures document. Incorporate any new information received from Legal and Compliance. Focus on clarity and comprehensiveness.

Research different accounting software and systems suitable for tracking fund performance and expenses. Consider factors like scalability, integration with existing systems, and reporting capabilities.
Prepare a shortlist of potential accounting systems. Document the pros and cons of each system, focusing on features relevant to the specific needs of the fund.
Email @COO-1 and @CIO-1 to schedule a meeting to discuss the shortlist of accounting systems and gather their input on the selection process. Subject: Accounting System Selection - Input Requested.
Work on a plan for setting up the selected accounting system. Outline the necessary steps for data migration, user training, and system configuration.
Draft a preliminary plan for tracking fund performance and expenses. Include key metrics, reporting frequency, and data sources.
Review the day's progress and prioritize tasks for tomorrow. Respond to email and Prepare to leave.
